name: exceptionally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is much greater than usual, especially in skill, intelligence, quality, etc.: an exceptionally fine portrait He is an exceptionally talented teacher. See
exceptional
More examplesFewer examplesThe school is for exceptionally gifted musicians. The event has been exceptionally well attended.It's unclear whether he knew about the exceptionally high lead levels in the house.
